column5: Bobby's Corner in Vermilion Bay. 807-227-2695. Not sure about price, give them a call and ask. You will be going right by them.
Going to Red Lake first week in June where is the cheapest place on the way to get a flat of crawlers? Anyone know what the going rate is this spring on a flat? Thanks Joe

Which way are you going up? If you go through Nestor Falls the Sport shop has them for 72 per flat.807-484-2525. If you call in advance they also will have your licenses filled out before you get there.
if you go thru ignace - vern's minnows - they were $50 last year. phish
Last 2 years no one had them openning weekend around Ignace. You could buy them by the couple dozen but no flats. Not even Vern's.
the opener is like rush hour - had no problem later in the season - call first and reserve them.

I have always bought them from Vrens, good worms and about the same price as here at home. This year we will be comming from the west so we wont be going through Ignace. On the 6th we will spend the night in Kenora then go north to Red Lake. Is there any place along that way to get them in the $50 range or should we just take them with us. Thanks
Call the shop in Nestor falls and make them an offer>>>Who knows? The crawlers have always been very healthy.Nice leeches too
Hi, I just order mine online from http://vadosbait.com/ ...REELXTC... LUND PRO-V 2025 IFS POWERED BY YAMAHA <*}}}}}}>< ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Go to Four Seasons in Ear Falls. 807-222-2200
If you're coming up through WI, stop at Sportsman's HQ in Minong, WI. $45 for a flat. 5 years for us, great product every time.
